DIA_Lunatic_MadMan_03_01: Oooo, I see your sincere smile. And your eyes, beautiful eyes.
DIA_Lunatic_MadMan_03_03: I settled in the city to get away from the monsters.
DIA_Lunatic_MadMan_03_05: Suspicious people walk the streets at night, just waiting to slit my throat!
DIA_Lunatic_MadMan2_15_01: Maybe you should tell the guard about it?
DIA_Lunatic_MadMan2_03_02: I've already talked to Araxos but they took me for some crazy person there!
DIA_Lunatic_MadMan2_03_03: But you're normal! You can help me.
DIA_Lunatic_MadMan2_03_04: Take my mushrooms and look after them. I'm leaving!
DIA_Lunatic_MadMan3_03_02: O! You're just like the rest of those maggots in town!
DIA_Lunatic_MadMan3_03_03: You're not getting me or my mushrooms!
